name: stylistic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to a particular style of doing something: In their second album, the band tried to expand their stylistic range. Notice the stylistic similarities in the work of these three sculptors.

of or relating to style: The first major stylistic change in popular music after rock was punk.
